title: How to redeem $15 Subway gift card
body:
Hey Riot,
I have a $15 Subway gift card and I was wondering how to redeem it because the options for subway go from $10 to $20.
So what do I do?

Thanks

replies.body: [Openbucks ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753254-Cash-and-Gift-Cards-Openbucks-)could be acting up.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team can help find some options for you.  We'll see you there!
